About the Company: Indian Bank was established as a part of the Swadeshi movement.The bank provides a wide spectrum of banking products and services.The services offered by the bank includes Personal Banking -Under this the bank offers fixed deposits, saving accounts, recurring accounts, saving accounts for kids and senior citizens, internet banking, ATM facility, debit/credit cards, home loans, personal loans.NRI services- The bank offers banking products and services to NRI clients such as saving accounts, remittance facilities, forex advisory services, home loans, etc.They also provide cash management services (CMS), eletronic funds transfer schemes as well as provides seven-day banking at few of their branches
